definitions.meaning: 表现出强烈的情感或热情
definitions.usage: 描述一个人对某事物充满热情、投入或强烈的情感，常用于表达对兴趣、事业、爱好或信念的热爱。

examples.scene: 一个年轻人在大学社团活动中，向同学们介绍自己热衷的环保事业，试图激励大家加入。
examples.chineseIdea: 他想要表达自己对环保的极大热情，并希望感染他人。
examples.sentenceWithBlank: She @ @ @ environmental conservation and inspires others to join her cause.
examples.fullEnglishSentence: She 「is passionate about」 environmental conservation and inspires others to join her cause.
examples.chineseTranslation: 她「对环境保护充满热情」，激励他人加入她的事业。
examples.chinglishFix: 典型中式英语：'She very love environment protection.' 纠正：'She is passionate about environmental conservation.'

examples.scene: 一位政治家在竞选活动中发表演说，试图用充满感染力的语言打动选民。
examples.chineseIdea: 他希望通过演讲展现自己的信念和热情，赢得支持。
examples.sentenceWithBlank: His @ @ moved the audience and gained their support.
examples.fullEnglishSentence: His 「passionate speech」 moved the audience and gained their support.
examples.chineseTranslation: 他的「充满激情的演讲」打动了观众，赢得了他们的支持。
examples.chinglishFix: 典型中式英语：'His speech very exciting.' 纠正：'His passionate speech moved the audience.'

definitions.meaning: 充满浪漫或强烈感情的
definitions.usage: 描述浪漫关系或亲密行为中强烈的感情，通常带有感性或身体上的亲密含义。

examples.scene: 在一部浪漫电影中，男女主角在雨中重逢，深情地表达彼此的爱意。
examples.chineseIdea: 他们通过一个深情的动作表达浓烈的爱。
examples.sentenceWithBlank: They shared a @ @ in the pouring rain, oblivious to the world around them.
examples.fullEnglishSentence: They shared a 「passionate kiss」 in the pouring rain, oblivious to the world around them.
examples.chineseTranslation: 他们在倾盆大雨中分享了一个「充满激情的吻」，完全忘记了周围的世界。
examples.chinglishFix: 典型中式英语：'They kiss very strong.' 纠正：'They shared a passionate kiss.'

examples.scene: 一对恋人在纪念日庆祝时，回忆起他们刚开始恋爱时的甜蜜时光。
examples.chineseIdea: 他们想要表达那段感情的强烈和浪漫。
examples.sentenceWithBlank: Their @ @ @ began with late-night talks and endless adventures.
examples.fullEnglishSentence: Their 「passionate love affair」 began with late-night talks and endless adventures.
examples.chineseTranslation: 他们的「充满激情的恋情」始于深夜的交谈和无尽的冒险。
examples.chinglishFix: 典型中式英语：'Their love very hot.' 纠正：'Their passionate love affair began with late-night talks.'
